prompt: character: Newborn Mary, background: Cozy small-town Iowa hospital room, relation: Mary's birth, camera pose: Close-up shot of Mary's face, HDR description: The soft morning light filters through the hospital windows, illuminating the room as newborn Mary takes her first breath.

character: Toddler Mary, background: Sun-drenched backyard, relation: Mary's childhood, camera pose: Mid-shot of Mary chasing a butterfly, HDR description: The bright, playful scene unfolds in a backyard bathed in sunlight as toddler Mary squeals with delight, chasing a fluttering monarch butterfly.

character: Six-year-old Mary, background: Lively classroom, relation: Mary's school life, camera pose: Close-up shot of Mary reciting the pledge, HDR description: Amidst the bustle of a lively classroom, six-year-old Mary earnestly recites the Pledge of Allegiance, her tiny hand on her heart, a symbol of her innocent dedication.

character: Mary, background: Home on a snowy Christmas morning, relation: Mary's childhood Christmas, camera pose: Medium shot of Mary with her new bicycle, HDR description: The Christmas morning scene is painted with joy as Mary unwraps her first bicycle, her eyes wide with pure joy.

character: Mary, background: Local school under the warm sun, relation: Mary's academic achievement, camera pose: Mid-shot of Mary holding her spelling bee trophy, HDR description: Under the warm afternoon sun, Mary wins her first spelling bee at the local school, her face flushed with the sweet triumph of success.

character: Mary, background: Junior high prom, relation: Mary's adolescence, camera pose: Medium shot of Mary dancing, HDR description: In the golden dusk light, Mary experiences her first dance at the junior high prom, her heart fluttering with innocent excitement, marking the threshold of her adolescence.

character: Mary, background: High school library, relation: Mary's academic achievement, camera pose: Close-up shot of Mary holding her acceptance letter, HDR description: Beneath the stark fluorescent lights of the library, high school senior Mary holds her acceptance letter to a prestigious university, a landmark moment in her academic journey.

character: Mary, background: College campus under a starlit sky, relation: Mary's college life, camera pose: Wide shot of Mary looking at the sky, HDR description: Under the canopy of a starlit sky, Mary experiences the exhilarating freedom of her first night at college, a world of possibilities opening before her.

character: Mary, background: College library, relation: Mary's academic determination, camera pose: Close-up shot of Mary studying, HDR description: In the hushed silence of the college library, Mary burns the midnight oil, her determination reflected in her intense gaze, a testament to her unwavering pursuit of knowledge.

character: Mary, background: College graduation ceremony, relation: Mary's graduation, camera pose: Medium shot of Mary receiving her diploma, HDR description: During a vibrant spring graduation ceremony, Mary walks across the stage to receive her diploma, her heart pounding with pride, the culmination of her academic journey.

character: Mary, background: Busy New York newsroom, relation: Mary's first job, camera pose: Wide shot of Mary in the newsroom, HDR description: In the hustle and bustle of a busy New York newsroom, Mary lands her first job as a journalist, her spirit brimming with ambition and the promise of a bright future.

character: Mary, background: Apartment on a rainy evening, relation: Mary's heartbreak, camera pose: Close-up shot of Mary looking out the window, HDR description: On a rainy evening, Mary experiences her first heartbreak, her tears blending with the raindrops on the window, an intimate portrait of her emotional journey.

character: Mary, background: Quiet solitude of her apartment, relation: Mary's creative process, camera pose: Mid-shot of Mary typing on her typewriter, HDR description: In the quiet solitude of her apartment, Mary spends countless nights crafting her first novel, her fingers dancing over the typewriter keys, a testament to her creative spirit.

character: Mary, background: Publisher's office on a sunny afternoon, relation: Mary's first book deal, camera pose: Close-up shot of Mary signing the book deal, HDR description: On a sunny afternoon, Mary signs her first book deal, her dreams slowly becoming a reality, marking a significant milestone in her career as a writer.

character: Mary, background: Glittering city lights, relation: Mary's romantic encounter, camera pose: Medium shot of Mary and her future husband, HDR description: Under the glittering city lights, Mary meets her future husband, their connection immediate and tangible, the spark of a love story about to unfold.

character: Mary, background: Candlelit dinner setting, relation: Mary's engagement, camera pose: Medium shot of Mary accepting the proposal, HDR description: In the soft glow of a candlelit dinner, Mary accepts a marriage proposal, her eyes sparkling with love and hope, marking the beginning of a new chapter in her life.

character: Mary, background: Countryside chapel, relation: Mary's wedding, camera pose: Wide shot of Mary getting married, HDR description: Amidst the serene setting of a countryside chapel, Mary marries, her happiness radiating like the summer sun, the joyous culmination of her love story.

character: Mary, background: Moonlit nursery, relation: Mary's motherhood, camera pose: Close-up shot of Mary cradling her newborn daughter, HDR description: In the quiet of a moonlit nursery, Mary cradles her newborn daughter, her heart filled with a love she's never known, the tender moment marking her journey into motherhood.

character: Mary, background: Various settings over the years, relation: Mary's motherhood journey, camera pose: Montage of Mary with her growing daughter, HDR description: Throughout the years, Mary watches her daughter grow, her pride swelling with each milestone, a montage capturing the heartwarming journey of her motherhood.

character: Mary, background: Daughter's high school graduation, relation: Mary's transition to an empty nest, camera pose: Medium shot of Mary watching her daughter graduate, HDR description: Under the shadow of her daughter's high school graduation, Mary feels the bittersweet pang of an empty nest, a poignant snapshot of her evolving role as a mother.

character: Mary, background: Quiet study, relation: Mary's professional achievement, camera pose: Close-up shot of Mary holding her bestselling novel, HDR description: In the stillness of a quiet study, Mary pens her bestselling novel, her success a testament to her resilience and unwavering dedication to her craft.

character: Mary, background: Home on a balmy summer evening, relation: Mary's grandmotherhood, camera pose: Close-up shot of Mary with her grandchild, HDR description: On a balmy summer evening, Mary becomes a proud grandmother, her heart warmed by the soft coos of her first grandchild, a tender moment encapsulating the joy of her grandmotherhood.

character: Mary, background: Family home during Thanksgiving dinner, relation: Mary's family life, camera pose: Wide shot of Mary with her family, HDR description: Amidst the golden hues of a Thanksgiving dinner, Mary is surrounded by her growing family, her heart full of gratitude, a heartwarming tableau of her family life.

character: Mary, background: Family home, relation: Mary's storytelling tradition, camera pose: Medium shot of Mary reading to her grandchildren, HDR description: In the cozy comfort of her family home, Mary reads her stories to her grandchildren, their eyes full of wonder, a cherished tradition echoing the power of her storytelling.

character: Mary, background: Sunset setting, relation: Mary's 50th wedding anniversary, camera pose: Medium shot of Mary and her husband, HDR description: During a quiet sunset, Mary celebrates her 50th wedding anniversary, her love for her husband as strong as ever, a testament to their enduring bond.

character: Mary, background: Solitude of her writing room, relation: Mary's career conclusion, camera pose: Close-up shot of Mary penning her final novel, HDR description: In the solitude of her writing room, Mary pens her final novel, her legacy enshrined in print, marking the conclusion of her illustrious writing career.

character: Mary, background: Mary's 80th birthday celebration, relation: Mary's birthday, camera pose: Wide shot of Mary surrounded by family and friends, HDR description: Amidst the laughter and tears of her 80th birthday, Mary revels in the love of her family and friends, a joyous celebration of her remarkable life.

character: Mary, background: Dawn setting, relation: Mary's farewell to her husband, camera pose: Medium shot of Mary saying goodbye, HDR description: In the gentle dawn light, Mary says her last goodbye to her husband, her heart heavy with sorrow, a poignant moment capturing the depth of her love and loss.

character: Mary, background: Home, relation: Mary's final moments, camera pose: Medium shot of Mary surrounded by loved ones, HDR description: In the quiet comfort of her home, surrounded by her loved ones, Mary takes her last breath, her life a beautiful tapestry of memories, a solemn tribute to her extraordinary journey.

character: Mary's family, background: Mary's funeral, relation: Mary's legacy, camera pose: Wide shot of the family gathering, HDR description: On a peaceful afternoon, Mary's family gathers for her funeral, her spirit living on through her stories and the love she left behind, a poignant testament to her enduring legacy.
